abilities.name: Biotic Rifle
abilities.description: Long-range rifle that heals allies and damages enemies. Hold to zoom in.

abilities.name: Sleep Dart
abilities.description: Fires a dart that puts an enemy to sleep.

abilities.name: Biotic Grenade
abilities.description: Throws a grenade that heals and increases healing on allies, while damaging and preventing healing on enemies.

abilities.name: Nano Boost
abilities.description: Increases an ally's damage, while reducing damage taken.

abilities.name: The Viper
abilities.description: Semi-automatic rifle. Hold to zoom in, increasing damage and accuracy but slowing rifle rate of fire.

abilities.name: Coach Gun
abilities.description: Blast enemies in front of you and knock yourself backwards.

abilities.name: Dynamite
abilities.description: Throw an explosive that detonates after a short delay or immediately when shot.

abilities.name: B.O.B.
abilities.description: Deploy Bob. He charges forward and knocks enemies into the air, then attacks with his arm cannons.

abilities.name: Biotic Launcher
abilities.description: Three-round burst gun. Lob a healing projectile that heals all allies near the impact.

abilities.name: Regenerative Burst
abilities.description: Activate to heal yourself or nearby allies instantly, with additional healing over time. Instant heal is doubled for tragets less than half health.

abilities.name: Immortality Field
abilities.description: Toss a device that prevents allies from dying. The device can be destroyed.

abilities.name: Amplification Matrix
abilities.description: Project a matrix that doubles the damage and healing effcts of allied projectiles.

abilities.name: Exo Boots
abilities.description: Hold crouch to jump higher.

abilities.name: Configuration: Assault
abilities.description: A slow-moving tank with a powerful rotary cannon.

abilities.name: Configuration: Recon
abilities.description: Mobile, with a lightweight and highly accurate weapon.

abilities.name: A-36 Tactical Grenade
abilities.description: Fire a bomb that bounces off walls and explodes when it impacts enemies or the ground.

abilities.name: Reconfigure
abilities.description: Switch between weapon configurations.

abilities.name: Configuration: Artillery
abilities.description: Become immobile and fire up to 3 powerful artillery shells.

abilities.name: Rocket Flail
abilities.description: Melee weapon with extended range.

abilities.name: Repair Pack
abilities.description: Heals an ally for a short duration.

abilities.name: Whip Shot
abilities.description: Launch your flail forward to knock an enemy away from you.

abilities.name: Barrier Shield
abilities.description: Hold mouse to deploy a frontal energy barrier.

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.description: Available when Barrier Shield is deployed. Dash forward to knock back an enemy.

abilities.name: Rally
abilities.description: Gain armor, empower Barrier Shield, and provide extra health to nearby allies.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.description: Dealing damage to enemies heals nearby allies.

abilities.name: Peacekeeper
abilities.description: Accurate, powerful revolver. Wildly fire remaining rounds.

abilities.name: Combat Roll
abilities.description: Roll in the direction you're moving to take reduced damage and reload.

abilities.name: Magnetic Grenade
abilities.description: Throw a homing grenade that sticks to enemies, slowing them and preventing them from using movement abilities.

abilities.name: Deadeye
abilities.description: Face off against your enemies. Press Q to lock on, then Q or ABILITY 3 to fire.

abilities.name: Fusion Cannons
abilities.description: Automatic short-range spread weapons.

abilities.name: Light Gun
abilities.description: Automatic weapon

abilities.name: Boosters
abilities.description: Fly in the direction you are facing.

abilities.name: Defense Matrix
abilities.description: Block projectiles in an area in front of you.

abilities.name: Micro Missiles
abilities.description: Launch a volley of explosive rockets.

abilities.name: Self-Destruct
abilities.description: Eject and overload your mech, causing it to explode after a short time.

abilities.name: Call Mech
abilities.description: Call down a new mech.

abilities.name: Eject!
abilities.description: Eject out of your mech when it is destroyed.

abilities.name: Hand Cannon
abilities.description: Short-range weapon with spread. Reloads automatically.

abilities.name: Rocket Punch
abilities.description: Hold to charge then release to launch forward and knock an enemy back. Damage increases if the enemy hits a wall.

abilities.name: Seismic Slam
abilities.description: Leap and smash the ground.

abilities.name: Power Block
abilities.description: Protect yourself from frontal attacks. Blocking heavy damage empowers Rocket Punch.

abilities.name: Meteor Strike
abilities.description: Press Q to leap up into the air. Move the targeting circle, then press ABILITY 3 to strike the targeted area.

abilities.name: Tri-Shot
abilities.description: Fires 3 shots at once, in a triangle pattern.

abilities.name: Sticky Bombs
abilities.description: Fire a volley of sticky bombs that detonate after a delay.

abilities.name: Flight
abilities.description: Fly forward quickly and then free-fly briefly.

abilities.name: Focusing Beam
abilities.description: Channel a beam for a few seconds. Deals very high damage to targets under half health.

abilities.name: Duplicate
abilities.description: Become a copy of the targeted enemy hero. They cannot swap heroes for the duration.

abilities.name: Glide
abilities.description: Hold jump to glide while falling.

abilities.name: Shuriken
abilities.description: Throw an accurate brust of 3 projectiles. Throw a fan of 3 projectiles in an arc.

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.description: Deflect incoming projectiles towards the direction you are aiming and block melee attacks.

abilities.name: Swift Strike
abilities.description: Rapidly dash forward and inflict damage on enemies. Eliminations reset the cooldown.

abilities.name: Dragonblade
abilities.description: Unsheathe a deadly melee weapon.

abilities.name: Cyber-Agility
abilities.description: Climb on walls and double jump.

abilities.name: Storm Bow
abilities.description: Hold to charge then release to launch arrows further.

abilities.name: Storm Arrows
abilities.description: The next 5 arrows ricochet and fire instantly at reduced damage.

abilities.name: Sonic Arrow
abilities.description: Reveals enemies for a short time upon impact.

abilities.name: Lunge
abilities.description: Double Jump.

abilities.name: Dragonstrike
abilities.description: Launch a deadly Dragon Spirit that devastates enemies it passes through.

abilities.name: Wall Climb
abilities.description: Jump at walls to climb up them.

abilities.name: Scattergun
abilities.description: Pump action shotgun.

abilities.name: Jagged Blade
abilities.description: Active: Throw the blade. Re-activate to pull it back, along with any impaled enemy. Passive: Wound enemies hit by Quick Melee or Throw, dealing damage over time.

abilities.name: Commanding Shout
abilities.description: Grants temporary health and movement speed to yourself and allies.

abilities.name: Carnage
abilities.description: Wound all enemies in front of you, dealing damage over time and reducing the cooldown for each enemy hit.

abilities.name: Rampage
abilities.description: Charge forward. Wounds enemies, dealing damage over time and preventing them from being healed.

abilities.name: Adrenaline Rush
abilities.description: Heal from all damage over time dealt by wounds.

abilities.name: Frag Launcher
abilities.description: Bouncing explosive projectile weapon.

abilities.name: Concussion Mine
abilities.description: Throw a knockback ine with LSHIFT the detonate it with ABILITY 1.

abilities.name: Steel Trap
abilities.description: Place an immobilizing trap.

abilities.name: Rip-Tire
abilities.description: Drive and detonate an exploding tire.

abilities.name: Total Mayhem
abilities.description: Deals no damage to self with explosives. Drop bombs on death.

abilities.name: Healing Ofuda
abilities.description: Channel a burst of healing talisman that can seek targeted allies.

abilities.name: Kunai
abilities.description: Thrown projectiles that deals increased crtitical damage.

abilities.name: Swift Step
abilities.description: Teleport directly to an ally.

abilities.name: Protection Suzu
abilities.description: Throw a protective charm to make allies become briefly invulnerable and cleansed of most negative effects.

abilities.name: Kitsune Rush
abilities.description: Summon a fox spirit that rushes forward, accelerating the movement, attack speed, and cooldowns of allies that follow in its path.

abilities.name: Sonic Amplifier
abilities.description: Sonic projectile launcher.

abilities.name: Crossfade
abilities.description: Switches between two songs: Healing Boost heals nearby allies, and Speed Boost makes nearby allies move faster.

abilities.name: Amp It Up
abilities.description: Increase the effectiveness of your current song.

abilities.name: Soundwave
abilities.description: Create a short-range blast wave to knock enemies away from you.

abilities.name: Sound Barrier
abilities.description: Create temporary extra health for nearby allies.

abilities.name: Wall Ride
abilities.description: Jump onto a wall to ride along it.

abilities.name: Endothermic Blaster
abilities.description: Short-range spray weapon that slows enemies. Long-range icicle launcher.

abilities.name: Cryo-Freeze
abilities.description: Become vulnerable and heal yourself.

abilities.name: Ice Wall
abilities.description: Create a wall in front of you.

abilities.name: Blizzard
abilities.description: Launch a weather control drone that freezes enemies in a wide area.

abilities.name: Caduceus Staff
abilities.description: Hold to heal an ally. Hold to increase an ally's damage inflicted.

abilities.name: Caduceus Blaster
abilities.description: Automatic weapon.

abilities.name: Guardian Angel
abilities.description: Fly towards an ally. While in flight, Jump launches you forward, and Crouch launches you upward.

abilities.name: Resurrect
abilities.description: Revive a dead teammate.

abilities.name: Angelic Descent
abilities.description: Fall very slowly.

abilities.name: Valkyrie
abilities.description: Gain the ability to fly. Abilities are enhanced.

abilities.name: Biotic Grasp
abilities.description: Hold to heal all allies in front of you. Consumes biotic energy. Long range beam weapon. Damage dealt heals you and replenishes your biotic energy.

abilities.name: Biotic Orb
abilities.description: Launch a bouncing sphere that either heals nearby allies or damages nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Fade
abilities.description: Disappear, move faster, and become invulnerable, but you cannot shoot.

abilities.name: Coalescence
abilities.description: Fire a beam that heals allies and damages enemies.

abilities.name: Augmented Fusion Driver
abilities.description: Automatic heat based weapon.

abilities.name: Energy Javelin
abilities.description: Launch your javelin at an enemy to stun and knock them back. More effective if the enemy hits a wall.

abilities.name: Fortify
abilities.description: Gain temporary health, reducing all damage taken and becoming unstoppable. While active, heat generated by your weapon is reduced.

abilities.name: Javelin Spin
abilities.description: Spin your javelin to destroy projectiles and block melee attacks, while also pushing enemies and increasing forward speed.

abilities.name: Terra Surge
abilities.description: Sweep enemies and anchor down, gaining the effects of Fortify and charging up a surge of damage. Use Q to unleash the surge early.

abilities.name: Rocket Launcher
abilities.description: Long-range explosive projectile weapon.

abilities.name: Jet Dash
abilities.description: Boost horizontally.

abilities.name: Jump Jet
abilities.description: Fly rapidly upwards. Grants some fuel.

abilities.name: Concussive Blast
abilities.description: Launch an explosive blast to knock back enemies.

abilities.name: Barrage
abilities.description: Launch a continuous volley of mini-rockets.

abilities.name: Hover Jets
abilities.description: Hold to hover.

abilities.name: Void Accelerator (Omnic Form)
abilities.description: Fire a stream of projectiles.

abilities.name: Void Barrier (Omnic Form)
abilities.description: Create a barrier at the targeted location.

abilities.name: Pummel (Nemesis Form)
abilities.description: Punch, creating a wave of piercing energy with every swing.

abilities.name: Ravenous Vortex
abilities.description: Fire a sphere of energy that creates a slowing vortex on the ground, damaging enemies within and pulling them downward.

abilities.name: Annihilation
abilities.description: Enter Nemesis Form and create a deadly swarm that lashes out at nearby enemies, persisting longer when damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Hellfire Shotguns
abilities.description: Short-range spread weapons.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: Teleport to a targeted location.

abilities.name: Wraith Form
abilities.description: Move faster and become invulnerable, but you cannot shoot.

abilities.name: Death Blossom
abilities.description: Damage all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: The Reaping
abilities.description: Dealing damage heals you.

abilities.name: Rocket Hammer
abilities.description: Devastating melee weapon.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Charge forward and smash an enemy against a wall.

abilities.name: Fire Strike
abilities.description: Launch a fiery projectile.

abilities.name: Barrier Field
abilities.description: Hold mouse to deploy a frontal energy barrier.

abilities.name: Earthshatter
abilities.description: Knock down all enemies in front of you.

abilities.name: Scrap Gun
abilities.description: Short-range spread weapon with a medium-range shrapnel volley

abilities.name: Chain Hook
abilities.description: Drag a targeted enemy to you.

abilities.name: Take a Breather
abilities.description: Heal yourself and reduce damage taken.

abilities.name: Pig Pen
abilities.description: Launch a trap that slows and damages nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Whole Hog
abilities.description: Damage and knock back enemies in front of you.

abilities.name: Hyperspheres
abilities.description: Launch two charges which implode after a short duration, dealing damage in an area.

abilities.name: Kinetic Grasp
abilities.description: Absorb projectiles in front of you and convert them into extra health.

abilities.name: Accretion
abilities.description: Gather a mass of debris and throw it at an enemy to knock them down.

abilities.name: Experimental Barrier
abilities.description: Hold to propel a floating barrier; release to stop. Press again to recall the barrier to you.

abilities.name: Gravitic Flux
abilities.description: Manipulates gravity to lift enemies into the air and slam them back down.

abilities.name: Railgun
abilities.description: Rapid firing projectiles that generate energy on hit. High impact shot that consumes stored energy.

abilities.name: Power Slide
abilities.description: Ground slide that can cancel into a high jump.

abilities.name: Disruptor Shot
abilities.description: Launch an energy burst that deals damage to enemies within it.

abilities.name: Overclock
abilities.description: Railgun energy auto-charges for a short duration and charged shots pierce enemies.

abilities.name: Heavy Pulse Rifle
abilities.description: Automatic assault weapon.

abilities.name: Sprint
abilities.description: Run faster while moving forward.

abilities.name: Biotic Field
abilities.description: Deploy a field that heals you and your allies.

abilities.name: Helix Rockets
abilities.description: Launch a volley of explosive rockets.

abilities.name: Tactical Visor
abilities.description: Automatically aims your weapon at targets in view.

abilities.name: Machine Pistol
abilities.description: Short-range automatic weapon.

abilities.name: Hack
abilities.description: Hold to hack. Hacked enemies cannot use abilities and can be seen through walls. Hacked health packs spawn faster and can't be used by enemies. Taking damage interrupts the hack attempt.

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.description: When out of combat, become invisible and move faster.

abilities.name: Translocator
abilities.description: Throw a beacon and teleport to it. Stealth cooldown is reduced after teleporting.

abilities.name: Virus
abilities.description: Infect enemies with a projectile that deals damage over time. Virus damages hacked enemies at a faster rate.

abilities.name: EMP
abilities.description: Deal damage to all nearby enemies equal to a precentage of their current health, hacking them and destroying barriers around you.

abilities.name: Photon Projector
abilities.description: Short-range beam weapon with increasing damage. Hold to charge, release to fire explosive orb.

abilities.name: Sentry Turret
abilities.description: Deploy a small turret that damages and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Teleporter
abilities.description: Create two temporary teleporters that enable instant travel between them.

abilities.name: Photon Barrier
abilities.description: Deploy a massive energy barrier.

abilities.name: Rivet Gun
abilities.description: Slow firing, long-ranged weapon. Inaccurate but powerful short-range weapon.

abilities.name: Forge Hammer
abilities.description: Swing to repair your turret or damage an enemy.

abilities.name: Deploy Turret
abilities.description: Deploy a self-building turret.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description: Gain additional extra health as well as improved attack, movement, and reload speed.

abilities.name: Molten Core
abilities.description: Create pools of molten slag that damage enemies. Deals additional damage to armor.

abilities.name: Pulse Pistols
abilities.description: Short-range automatic weapons.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Teleport in the direction you are moving.

abilities.name: Recall
abilities.description: Travel back in time to your previous location and health.

abilities.name: Pulse Bomb
abilities.description: Throw a powerful sticky explosive.

abilities.name: Widow's Kiss
abilities.description: Automatic assault weapon. Hold for long-ranged sniper weapon.

abilities.name: Grappling Hook
abilities.description: Launch a hook that pulls you towards a ledge.

abilities.name: Venom Mine
abilities.description: Launch a poison trap.

abilities.name: Infra-Sight
abilities.description: Provide your team with a view of the enemy's location.

abilities.name: TeslaCannon
abilities.description: Electrical frontal-cone weapon. Hold to charge, release to fire focused electricity.

abilities.name: JumpPack
abilities.description: Leap forward into the air. Landing on an enemy damages them.

abilities.name: BarrierProjector
abilities.description: Deploy a protective energy dome.

abilities.name: PrimalRage
abilities.description: Gain immense health, but you can only leap and punch enemies.

abilities.name: Quad Cannons
abilities.description: Automatic assault weapons.

abilities.name: Grappling Claw
abilities.description: Launch a grappling claw to rapidly swing around the area. Enables high speed collisions to damage and knockback enemies.

abilities.name: Roll
abilities.description: Transform into a ball and increase maximum movement speed.

abilities.name: Piledriver
abilities.description: Slam into the ground below to damage and launch enemies upward.

abilities.name: Adaptive Shield
abilities.description: Create temporary extra health that increases with more nearby enemies. Some of the health can be transferred to allies.

abilities.name: Minefield
abilities.description: Deploy a massive field of proximity mines.

abilities.name: Particle Cannon
abilities.description: Short-range linear beam weapon. Energy grenade launcher.

abilities.name: Particle Barrier
abilities.description: Create a damage barrier around you.

abilities.name: Projected Barrier
abilities.description: Create a damage barrier around an ally.

abilities.name: Graviton Surge
abilities.description: Launch a gravity well that pulls enemies to it.

abilities.name: Energy
abilities.description: Damage blocked by barriers increases Particle Cannon damage.

abilities.name: Orb of Destruction
abilities.description: Energy projectile weapon. Charge to release more projectiles.

abilities.name: Orb of Discord
abilities.description: Launch this orb at an enemy to increase the damage they take.

abilities.name: Orb of Harmony
abilities.description: Launch this orb to an ally to heal them.

abilities.name: Transcendence
abilities.description: Become invulnerable, move faster, and heal nearby allies.

abilities.name: Snap Kick
abilities.description: Qucik melee damage increased by 50%, and its knockback is significantly increased.
